endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of all managed energy storage systems.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific storage system identified by {id}.
Register a new energy storage system with the management service.
Remove a specific storage system, identified by {id}, from the management service.
Update the configuration settings for a specific storage system identified by {id}.
Retrieve data on all charge-discharge cycles of a specific storage system identified by {id}.
Initiate a charge operation for a specific storage system identified by {id}.
Initiate a discharge operation for a specific storage system identified by {id}.
Retrieve a list of linked renewable energy sources integrated with the energy storage systems.
Link a specified renewable energy source identified by {id} to a storage system for optimized management.
